content.text:
# Edward Hald

| birth_place    = Stockholm, Sweden
| death_date     =
| death_place    = Stockholm, Sweden
}}
Edward Hald (17 September 1883 – 4 July 1980) was a Swedish sculptor. His work was part of the art competitions at the 1932 Summer Olympics and the 1936 Summer Olympics.
Works, a selection
File:Hald_pokal_1919.jpg|Girls playing with ball, 1919
File:Graalvas, formgiven av Edward Hald, mönstret utfört av Heinrich Wollman och hyttarbetet utfört av Knut Bergqvist - OF 3799.jpg|Graalvas, designed by Edward Hald and made by Knut Bergqvist, 1919
File:Brudkrona av glas och silver av Edward Hald - M 14353.jpg|Bridal crown, glass and silver, made for his daughter's wedding in 1946
